name: An Independent Lebanon!
description: We are finally free from outside control, and we pray that we will remain this way for all time to come!

name: Chehab Steps Down
description: It is clear that numerous people are growing tired of this political deadlock, and many are hoping to group up and demand that Chehab leave office.

name: Democracy at Any Cost
description: Democracy is the surest path to securing political stability, and we must establish and preserve it here in Lebanon no matter what must be done to make it happen.

name: Depoliticise the Army
description: There are countless examples throughout history of the negative consequences of the military being actively involved in politics. We must make the army a most serene institution, loyal only to the state, no matter who is in charge!

name: Deal with the Political Dynasties
description: The political dynasties that have controlled Lebanon for decades must be dealt with one way or another...

name: Peace and Stability
description: Lebanon has seen much conflict recently. There has been too much bloodshed and too many tears. Let us heal, and be at peace with ourselves and each other.

name: A New Constitution
description: It is now time for Lebanon to have a proper constitution. Let us gather the great and the good of our society and debate and decide what kind of constitution we should have!

name: al-Haya al-Ijtimaiyya
description: Lebanon as a nation must be blessed with stability, religious tolerance, the equality of women and men, economic prosperity, and peace within the land.

name: The Third Reform Society Conference
description: The Third Reform Society Conference shall call together all of the progressives of Lebanon together in a grand meeting that shall lay out the political agenda for the term and ensure unity within the party. It shall be a grand spectacle that will show all the world what our party has in store for Lebanon!

name: Reject the National Pact
description: The National Pact was touted as a way to ensure equality within Lebanon. But instead, it gave favor to the Maronite Christians over the other faiths within Lebanon. Therefore, we shall dispense with the National Pact and allow anyone of any faith to rise to any position they can.

name: al-Hayat al-Adabiyya
description: Women are a vital component of society, and especially of the home. It has been a travesty that to this point that women have been ignored, and we must correct this.

name: One Lebanon, Not Two
description: We are not going to be divided. Not by religion, not by class, not by heritage. We are one Lebanon, not two., and we shall stand united against all rebel and secessionists

name: Enact Female Suffrage
description: A Democracy where half of the population cannot vote is a disgrace to the name! Let us give the franchise to women in order to create a much more equal society!

name: Al'umat al-Gharbia
description: Lebanon is an occidental nation. We are as much a part of the West as the French and British are, and our policies shall reflect this indisputable fact.

name: The Young Phoenicians
description: The Young Phoenicians are a very nationalistic force within Lebanon. Though not truly connected with the Phoenicianist ideology, which claims that the Lebanese are not Arabian but instead the descendents of the ancient Phoenicians, they are a loyal group that will do much to advance the cause of Lebanese nationalism. Especially among the Maronite Christians.

name: Embrace Confessionalism
description: Confessionalism refers to the complete embracing of the whole of religious doctrine, especially among Christians. Let us encourage the people to embrace everything the Maronite Church teaches.

name: Encourage Jewish Immigration
description: There are Jews living within Lebanon who have family abroad. By encouraging Jewish immigration and protecting their communities within Lebanon, we can bring in new citizens and their expertise.

name: Quell Sunni Nationalism
description: The Sunni Muslims are proud, and do not fully see themselves as a part of Lebanon. We must ensure their loyalty by removing any nationalist feelings that do not align with our own.

name: Crack Down on Militias
description: While useful during the early days to help secure our national independence, now the various militias that exist in Lebanon are a political liability. Let us... disarm and... defang... the militias before they can cause any unwanted trouble.

name: al-Mithaq al-Watani
description: The National Pact shall be the document that secures Lebanon's stability in the face of the religious pluralism that exists in this country. Our government, led by Bechara el-Khoury, shall create peace within Lebanon.

name: Work with Sunni Landowners
description: It is clear that we cannot be a nation of only one faith. Let us cooperate with the large Sunni landowners and bring them on the government's side through a nice round of kickbacks and other favors towards the large landowning families.

name: The Legal Reform
description: The legal code of Lebanon is a hodgepodge of law books from The Ottoman Empire and the few judgements that have been handed down since national independence was achieved. Leaving the laws like this could do quite a bit of damage to the little guys in Lebanon. We should take the time to consolidate and standardize the legal code to ensure safety, security, and sanity in the courts.

name: Suppress Syrian Nationalists
description: We are not, and never will be a part of Syria. Let us remind those nationalists who believe we should be united with them why we are a free nation, and why nothing they say or do will stop us.

name: Extend the Presidential Term
description: Who needs to constantly change out the Head of State? If we extend the President's term from four years to six, we can have greater stability and fewer sudden changes of government policy...

name: Ad-Dustour
description: The Constitution is the single greatest expression of the people and their collective will. Let us make sure that the constitution is properly revered and understood, and that all can cite chapter and verse from it.

name: al-Nahj al-Shihabi
description: The revolution has no winners and no losers. We ought to ensure a society where all feel like they have gained some of what they have desired, and none feel wronged by the revolution. We shall all know stability and cooperation together.

name: End the Dynasties
description: The great families of Lebanon are a threat to our stability and political control. Let us curtail their power and make sure that everyone knows that they are mere citizens... nothing more...

name: Crush the Marada Movement
description: The Marada militia fought well during the War of Liberation. But they are a threat now, and they are out to destroy the current government and remake it in their own image. We must arrest their leaders, crush their will, and ensure the safety of Lebanon.

name: Uproot Corruption
description: Corruption is a plague upon all states, and those who shelter and encourage it are punished accordingly. Let us find and destroy all corruption in the state of Lebanon before it can be too deeply rooted.

name: The One Lebanon Ideal
description: We are one nation, and one people. No matter our faith, we all are citizens of this nation, and we are proud of it!

name: A Progressive State
description: So much of the world has fallen to the darkness of Authoritarianism and evil, but we shall not! Lebanon shall stand as a shining beacon of equality and progressive ideals in the Middle East and around the world.

name: Allah, al-Watan, al-A’elat
description: A nation that puts God first in all things will be guided rightly and justly. A family that serves Lebanon loyally is a truly faithful family. Faith, family, and nation will always be intertwined.

name: Work with the Dynasties
description: The traditional leading families of Lebanon have long guided the people here. Let us develop closer ties between the Maronite Dynasties and the government, it can only benefit our stability.

name: Work with the Church
description: The Syriac Maronite Church is the cornerstone of our society, and deserves to be treated as such. Let church and state become friends, and ensure that the people are faithful and patriotic.

name: Destroy All Opposition
description: Why do we need opposition to our control? Are we not good enough, or are those who oppose us secretly plotting the downfall of Lebanon? No matter. Let us remove those who stand in the way of our national destiny. All of them, by whatever means deemed necessary...

name: Woo the Military
description: The support of the military can make or break a regime. We must bring general and soldier alike to our side, be it with bribery, threats, or any other methods needed...

name: The Maronite Nation
description: We are a nation centered upon the Syriac Maronite Church and its beliefs. Let us make sure that no citizen in this nation forgets that...

name: An International Lebanon
description: The world has fallen into a state of conflict not seen since the days of The Weltkrieg. The time has now come to decide Lebanon's place on the international stage. Should we join with the recently victorious Arabs, the well equipped and determined Entente, or should we seek to be at peace and maintain our neutrality?

name: Join the Entente
description: The Entente, though not the supreme nations they once were, are still a formidable force with a substantial presence in the Mediterranean. They can offer strong protection from the sea as well as provide a lot of technical expertise to Lebanon.

name: Join the Arabs
description: The Arab alliance has triumphed over the Ottoman Empire, and our independence is partially a result of their efforts. Let us align with them, and show the world that the nations of the Middle East will not be an easy target for any future ambitions.

name: Maintain our Neutrality
description: We are a nation that has only recently been freed, and our people long for a peaceful time to build up the nation and their families. Let us remain neutral, and let the world bleed itself dry while we prosper.

name: Reform the Volunteers' Army
description: The Volunteers Army served us well during the War of Liberation, but now it is time to be rid of it. Instead, a proper Lebanese Armed Forces must rise and take their place as the defenders of Lebanon.

name: Towards Greater Lebanon
description: Greater Lebanon is almost twice the size of the old Mount Lebanon Mutasarrifate under the Ottoman Empire. We must work to integrate the new lands we have gained for ourselves and to spread love to our new country.

name: A Western Army
description: The armies of the West nearly conquered the whole world in the 19th century, and remain some of the most advanced and disciplined armed forces in the world today. Let us look to take what is best from each of the Great Powers and develop a well trained and well disciplined army!

name: A Traditional Army
description: The armies of the West are strong, no doubt. But there is something to be said for more traditional models of army organization in the Middle East. Let us stick with what has worked well in the past, and develop a well trained and well disciplined army.

name: Study Foreign Artillery
description: Artillery assures the heavy firepower that the infantry can not carry upon their backs, and have provided crucial support for armies around the world in the last several centuries. By studying foreign designs, we can find a type of artillery that works best with our new army.

name: Adopt New Rifles
description: The rifles currently used by the Lebanese army are hand me downs from the old Ottoman Army and what has been supplied to us by sympathetic parties during the war of independence. Let us choose a single, high quality rifle that will serve as the workhorse of our infantry.

name: Expand the General Staff
description: Soldiers on the ground often lack the wider perspective needed to win a war, and require the men at headquarters to guide them. Our general staff is lacking in both the quality of officers and the quantity of men needed. Let us develop a strong core of officers and support staff to oversee our military.

name: Expand the Red Cross
description: The Red Cross in Lebanon lacks some of the more recent developments in medicine as well as trained doctors and nurses. Let us correct this grievous situation quickly, so that they may save more lives.

name: Assess the Economy
description: The Lebanese economy, while not in a terrible state, certainly needs improving. Let us create a commission that will document the state of the many sectors and industries of our burgeoning national economy to decide how best to develop it.

name: Modernize the Countryside
description: Outside of the urban centers, there is a distinct lack of modern amenities and infrastructure. This must be corrected quickly so that we may further develop our economy!

name: Expand the Banking Sector
description: The banks that currently exist in Lebanon are mostly local branches of banks from when the Ottoman Empire still ruled these lands. We should encourage them to retool and rework themselves into other companies or to strike out on their own. Then we will have banks that will happily lend the people and the government what we need.

name: Rebuild the Textile Industry
description: There is much potential within the textile industry of Lebanon, and quite a bit of profit to be made. Though much of the industry was damaged in the conflict, we can rebuild it. We have the technology.

name: Introduce Cash Crops
description: Lebanon has a long tradition of agriculture going back to the most ancient empires of the Near East. We can leverage this history and the skill of our farmers into economically beneficial cash crops like tobacco leaves, and let our farmers become rich from it!

name: Wood Exports
description: The Forests of Lebanon produce Cedrus libani: a very durable and easy to work with wood. It is well regarded by those who appreciate the quality of different trees, and makes a great product for us to export! Let us develop the logging industry and profit from the size of Lebanon's woods!

name: International Investments
description: Our banking sector does not have the power by itself to invest in the Lebanese economy to the fullest extent. We can make up for this by becoming an attractive investment for international firms.

name: Expand Beirut
description: Beirut must become the grandest port city on the Levantine coast, so that we may bring in a great amount of investment and trade to our nation. The cost will be great, but it will be very much worth it.

name: Lebanese Wineries
description: There are few trade goods as old and as profitable as alcohol. Let us expand the wineries of Lebanon, and get drunk off the money that will come in!

name: Look to the West
description: The West is a great untapped market for our goods, and we will make quite the pretty penny by exporting to them. We shall all flourish together, and Lebanon's prosperity will only grow.

name: A Harbour for Arabia
description: Beirut's recent expansion has created a boom in trade and commerce. We should make further efforts to expand the port, both to encourage even more international trade, and to create the facilities needed in the event we build a navy of our own.

name: Building a Defence Industry
description: There is something to be said about being able to produce your own equipment for the military. It saves the hassle and consequences of having to import everything, makes you less dependant on friends and benefactors, and creates jobs in the factories! It is time we built our own defense industry.
